document_notes.text:
This update for busybox fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-48174: Fixed stack overflow vulnerability. (bsc#1214538)

notes.text: There is a stack overflow vulnerability in ash.c:6030 in busybox before 1.35. In the environment of Internet of Vehicles, this vulnerability can be executed from command to arbitrary code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
